channel.title: Minor bug: multiple instances of 'Assignment Terminated'
channel.description:
I noticed it after I killed two mission-critical NPCs at the same time, lol.
I made a clip of it and uploaded it to [url='https://youtu.be/WWJ_NSAQkRw']YouTube[/url].
